origin_dialogue: No, this is more of a super scary, flaming-eyed demon kind of deal.
translated_dialogue: No, this is more of a super scary, flaming-eyed demon kind of deal.

origin_dialogue: Okay, I'm pulling you out of there. Just give me a second.
translated_dialogue: Okay, I'm pulling you out of there. Just give me a second.

origin_dialogue: Hold on. I'm still getting some unusual interference. It's fascinating, as if someone else were--
translated_dialogue: Hold on. I'm still getting some unusual interference. It's fascinating, as if someone else were--

origin_dialogue: Oh, good boy. There's that pesky brain.
translated_dialogue: Oh, good boy. There's that pesky brain.

origin_dialogue: Now, don't you feel better, my dear lad?
translated_dialogue: Now, don't you feel better, my dear lad?

origin_dialogue: And this BAD tooth, we just drop it in the old garbage chute!
translated_dialogue: And this BAD tooth, we just drop it in the old garbage chute!

origin_dialogue: Now, don't chew solid foods for six hours!
translated_dialogue: Now, don't chew solid foods for six hours!

origin_dialogue: Little boy, I am sorry to say that you have a very serious mental problem. The trouble originates in this area here, the area that we in the medical profession like to refer to as
translated_dialogue: Little boy, I am sorry to say that you have a very serious mental problem. The trouble originates in this area here, the area that we in the medical profession like to refer to as

origin_dialogue: the brain. You see, son, it's just no good!
translated_dialogue: the brain. You see, son, it's just no good!

origin_dialogue: I hate to be so blunt, but YOU have the insanity... of a manatee!
translated_dialogue: I hate to be so blunt, but YOU have the insanity... of a manatee!

origin_dialogue: I know! People are always saying that! What do you think's wrong with my brain, Doctor?
translated_dialogue: I know! People are always saying that! What do you think's wrong with my brain, Doctor?

origin_dialogue: How should I know? I'm a dentist! But here's what I do know: if a tooth is bad, you pull it!
translated_dialogue: How should I know? I'm a dentist! But here's what I do know: if a tooth is bad, you pull it!

origin_dialogue: Yup! That brain's got to come out, boy. It's the quickest way to cure what you've got: INSANITY OF THE MIND!
translated_dialogue: Yup! That brain's got to come out, boy. It's the quickest way to cure what you've got: INSANITY OF THE MIND!

origin_dialogue: Shush-shush-shush-shush-shushie! Now hold still. This will only hurt until your brains come flying out!
translated_dialogue: Shush-shush-shush-shush-shushie! Now hold still. This will only hurt until your brains come flying out!

origin_dialogue: Is this a nightmare... or a plan?
translated_dialogue: Is this a nightmare... or a plan?

origin_dialogue: Razputin, I'm sorry. I had to abort the experiment. Something unbelievably urgent has come up and I must leave immediately.
translated_dialogue: Razputin, I'm sorry. I had to abort the experiment. Something unbelievably urgent has come up and I must leave immediately.

origin_dialogue: Hold that thought! In a rush! Official Psychonauts business!
translated_dialogue: Hold that thought! In a rush! Official Psychonauts business!

origin_dialogue: You are inside your own mind, but I'm not sure where. Tell me. What can you see?
translated_dialogue: You are inside your own mind, but I'm not sure where. Tell me. What can you see?

origin_dialogue: I see a run-down gypsy caravan.
translated_dialogue: I see a run-down gypsy caravan.

origin_dialogue: Yes. It's where I was born.
translated_dialogue: Yes. It's where I was born.

origin_dialogue: Sasha, I'm going inside the caravan.
translated_dialogue: Sasha, I'm going inside the caravan.

origin_dialogue: I'm not sure. It's getting fuzzy.
translated_dialogue: I'm not sure. It's getting fuzzy.

origin_dialogue: Razputin, are you okay? What do you see now?
translated_dialogue: Razputin, are you okay? What do you see now?

origin_dialogue: I see a small, bunny-like animal thing.
translated_dialogue: I see a small, bunny-like animal thing.

origin_dialogue: Hmmm. An unfamiliar animal entity in a dream often represents a primal fear or memory. Follow it, and it should lead you somewhere important.
translated_dialogue: Hmmm. An unfamiliar animal entity in a dream often represents a primal fear or memory. Follow it, and it should lead you somewhere important.

origin_dialogue: Check. Okay, Mr. Bun. You and I are gonna be tight. Wherever you go, I go. Like... two peas in a--hey!
translated_dialogue: Check. Okay, Mr. Bun. You and I are gonna be tight. Wherever you go, I go. Like... two peas in a--hey!

origin_dialogue: Hey! No fair! I blasted you, tank!
translated_dialogue: Hey! No fair! I blasted you, tank!

origin_dialogue: Rats. That tank is armored like a... tank!
translated_dialogue: Rats. That tank is armored like a... tank!

origin_dialogue: It must have a weak spot somewhere!
translated_dialogue: It must have a weak spot somewhere!

origin_dialogue: Probably not on the top though.
translated_dialogue: Probably not on the top though.

origin_dialogue: Probably, hidden on, like, the bottom.
translated_dialogue: Probably, hidden on, like, the bottom.

origin_dialogue: Razputin, tell me what is happening.
translated_dialogue: Razputin, tell me what is happening.

origin_dialogue: Well, I'm kind of stuck in a little, white space.
translated_dialogue: Well, I'm kind of stuck in a little, white space.

origin_dialogue: NO! Aaack! Get me out of here.
translated_dialogue: NO! Aaack! Get me out of here.

origin_dialogue: Can you find your way out?
translated_dialogue: Can you find your way out?

origin_dialogue: Can you fight your way out?
translated_dialogue: Can you fight your way out?

origin_dialogue: Strike out with your psychic fist, Razputin, but carefully.
translated_dialogue: Strike out with your psychic fist, Razputin, but carefully.

origin_dialogue: This test is costing the taxpayers a lot of money!
translated_dialogue: This test is costing the taxpayers a lot of money!

origin_dialogue: Don't worry, Dogen. I'm coming up there to save you!
translated_dialogue: Don't worry, Dogen. I'm coming up there to save you!

origin_dialogue: No time to explain, Sasha. I gotta climb this spooky thorn tower.
translated_dialogue: No time to explain, Sasha. I gotta climb this spooky thorn tower.

origin_dialogue: Argh! There's no way to get any higher!
translated_dialogue: Argh! There's no way to get any higher!

origin_dialogue: You must use your Levitation power.
translated_dialogue: You must use your Levitation power.

origin_dialogue: I don't know how to levitate...
translated_dialogue: I don't know how to levitate...

origin_dialogue: Okay, what the hell was that???
translated_dialogue: Okay, what the hell was that???

origin_dialogue: I'm seeing some crazy stuff in here, Sasha. This can't be right.
translated_dialogue: I'm seeing some crazy stuff in here, Sasha. This can't be right.

origin_dialogue: Ach.  Why did I buy the CHEAP Brain Tumbler?
translated_dialogue: Ach.  Why did I buy the CHEAP Brain Tumbler?

origin_dialogue: Hey, where'd it go? Don't tell me I imagined that whole thing?
translated_dialogue: Hey, where'd it go? Don't tell me I imagined that whole thing?

origin_dialogue: You are my own creation! I command you to stop!
translated_dialogue: You are my own creation! I command you to stop!

origin_dialogue: Soft, gelatinous underbelly, here I come.
translated_dialogue: Soft, gelatinous underbelly, here I come.
